title: I don’t know about you
author: VD
content_html: … but I’m a little concerned about this Republican plan to get rid of the CIA and replace it with a national intelligence organization. I’m not saying that the Republican leadership is politically tone-deaf or anything, but I heard that Geheime Staatspolizei was one of the names they were considering.
content_text: … but I’m a little concerned about this Republican plan to get rid of the CIA and replace it with a national intelligence organization.  I’m not saying that the Republican leadership is politically tone-deaf or anything, but I heard that Geheime Staatspolizei was one of the names they were considering.
